walkthrough.walkthrough1Title: Make faster fiat transaction with us
walkthrough.walkthrough1Description: Our platform will help you make your transaction faster and safer
walkthrough.walkthrough2Title: We take care of your money
walkthrough.walkthrough2Description: Our cyber security team takes care of security, and we follow strict guidelines that help us maintain the privacy of our users data.
walkthrough.walkthrough3Title: Lots of exciting offers and rewards
walkthrough.walkthrough3Description: On every transaction you make we give you starch card which can be used to get rewards.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.bySigningUp: By signing up you agree to the

verification.instruction1: Be ready with Passport photo, Driver’s License, and other Government issue Documentation to proof identity for KYC services
verification.instruction2: Make sure no flash light is reflected and it is clear
verification.faceVerificationInstruction: Please make sure that no shadows is there in face. It should be clear enough for identification.
verification.documentInstruction: Now place your phone directly on top of your passport and take a picture.
verification.documentInstruction2: Check the photo, submit or scan again if there is something missing.

bankDetails.cryptoInstruction: Please select the wallet & click connect to connect your Crypto wallet to BancIt. By connecting wallet you can easily make payments in the app.

fingerprintAuth.title: Fingerprint Auth
fingerprintAuth.description: You can use fingerprint authentication to access your BancIt account.

faceAuth.title: Face Auth
faceAuth.description: You can use face authentication to access your BancIt account.
faceAuth.instructions2: Point your face right at the box, then take a photo

pin.title: Set PIN
pin.description: You can use fingerprint authentication to access your BancIt account.

accountVerified.title: Account Verified
accountVerified.description: Your account has been verified succesfully, now let’s enjoy Paypay features!
